channel.title: Luévano's Blog
channel.description: A personal weblog ranging from rants to how to's and other thoughts.

item.title: Create a git server and setup cgit web app (on Nginx)
item.description: How to create a git server using cgit on a server running Nginx. This is a follow up on post about creating a website with Nginx and Certbot.

item.title: Create a mail server with Postfix, Dovecot, SpamAssassin and OpenDKIM
item.description: How to create mail server using Postfix, Dovecot, SpamAssassin and OpenDKIM. This is a follow up on post about creating a website with Nginx and Certbot.

item.title: Create a website with Nginx and Certbot
item.description: How to create website that runs on Nginx and uses Certbot for SSL certificates. This is a base for future blog posts about similar topics.

item.title: Así es raza, el blog ya tiene timestamps
item.description: Actualización en el estado del blog y el sistema usado para crearlo.

item.title: Shell scripting tutorial video notes
item.description: Notes of videos about shell scripting, as requested by a mentor of mine.

item.title: Linux tutorial video notes
item.description: Notes of videos about basic Linux terms, usage and commands, as requested by a mentor of mine.

item.title: SQL tutorial video notes
item.description: Notes of videos about basic SQL syntax and usage, as requested by a mentor of mine.

item.title: This is the first blog post, just for testing purposes
item.description: Just my first blog post where I state what tools I'm using to build this blog.
